subject: MEDT
title: Intro: Clin Lab Sci
info: basic clinical lab techniques--centrifuges, analytical balances, photometry, microscopy, pipetting, calculations, and quality control. blood collection, specimen handling, and safety.

subject: MEDT
title: App Clin Virology
info: application of basic methods and techniques in the clinical virology laboratory.

subject: MEDT
title: Prin Diag Microbiol
info: current techniques used in the laboratory diagnosis of infectious disease; isolation and identification of bacteria and yeasts; antimicrobial susceptibility testing.  lecture and lab.

subject: MEDT
title: Intro Mgmt Educ II
info: basic concepts in management and education.
